document_data.caption: Mount Tesh, northwest of Teshwave. Click to enlarge.
document_data.name: Mount Tesh
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Tesh''' was a mountain in [[Teshendale]] within the [[Dalelands]].
document_data.History: Since around [[1267 DR]], the inhabitants of the Dalelands avoided the dark slopes of Mount Tesh.
document_data.Rumors: After the [[Zhent]] invasion, strange things happened on Mount Tesh, such as disappearances and reports of ghostly ''[[dancing lights]]''.
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Skondarr]], a former bandit stronghold, was located beneath Mount Tesh. Its entrance was on the southwestern slope of the mountain.{{Cite dragon/291/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Skondarr|80}}
